description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Biology or Chemistry with the intent to continue their education to obtain a medical degree. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Biology or Chemistry major with intent to continue education to obtain a medical degree Undergraduate student 3.5 GPA or above Demonstrate financial need Two faculty letters of recommendation

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
